item.description:
Bonjour tout le monde,

 

We are trying again to have an event on a week night to accommodate more members. A few points worth noticing:

 

-- The Microsoft store's Community Room  can only sit a smaller number of people than The Asgard. So, please, make sure and sign up early. I really need to know ahead of time how many people are coming.

-- They also have a set time for us to free the room. We must finish by 9:00 P.M.

-- Of course, food will not be available. They might provide some soda. I will need to double check on that one. I will send an update.

-- The registration cut-off time is 2:00 P.M. for both week days and weekends. So, please, plan accordingly.

-- And lastly, a major issue, if you have registered and find out you will not be able to make it, please, please, release your spot so another member can use it.

 

Thanks all for being such a great group!!

 

À bientôt,,

Frantz

group.name: The Boston French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Rendez-vous en semaine
